scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run mkdirs; npm run build:html; npm run min:all; npm run copyassets;
scripts.mkdirs: mkdir dist; mkdir dist/print; mkdir dist/assets; mkdir dist/assets/files; mkdir dist/assets/fonts; mkdir dist/assets/images; mkdir dist/assets/js; mkdir dist/assets/favicons; mkdir dist/assets/css;
scripts.min:all: npm run min:js; npm run min:css; npm run process-html
scripts.min:css: npm run postcss; cleancss --source-map --output dist/assets/css/style.min.css dist/assets/css/style.css
scripts.min:js: uglifyjs assets/js/jquery.flexslider-2.6.0.js assets/js/jquery.html5-placeholder-shim.js assets/js/jquery.waypoints-4.0.0.js assets/js/waypoints.inview-4.0.0.js assets/js/jquery.fittext-1.2.js assets/js/jquery.magnific-popup-1.0.1.js assets/js/jquery.nav-3.0.0.js assets/js/jquery.sticky-1.0.3.js assets/js/morphext.js assets/js/jquery.easypiechart-2.1.7.js assets/js/app.js --compress --mangle --output dist/assets/js/app.min.js -cmo dist/assets/js/main.min.js --source-map url=dist/assets/js/app.min.js.map;
scripts.copyassets: cp -r assets/fonts/ dist/assets/fonts; cp -r assets/files/ dist/assets/files;  cp -r assets/images/ dist/assets/images; cp assets/js/modernizr.js dist/assets/js/; cp -r assets/favicons/ dist/assets/favicons; cp -r assets/print/ dist/assets/print;
scripts.process-html: npm run htmlpre; npm run min:html
